description: Merge PR #281 - File format selection guidelines for AI agent optimization
steps: Check out PR #281 branch
Verify it's MERGEABLE status
Review the changes (docs about file format selection)
Merge using: gh pr merge 281 --admin --squash --delete-branch
Verify merge successful
Update main branch: git pull origin main

description: Merge PR #287 - Add merge-conflict PR agent automation
steps: Check out PR #287 branch
Verify it's MERGEABLE status
Review the changes (PR conflict resolution agent)
Merge using: gh pr merge 287 --admin --squash --delete-branch
Verify merge successful
Update main branch: git pull origin main

description: Resolve conflicts and merge PR #220 - Change default logging level
steps: Check out PR #220 branch: copilot/fix-docker-scan-output
Status is CONFLICTING - needs rebase
Fetch latest main: git fetch origin main
Rebase on main: git rebase origin/main
If conflicts, resolve them (likely config files)
Continue rebase: git rebase --continue
Force push: git push -f origin copilot/fix-docker-scan-output
Merge using: gh pr merge 220 --admin --squash --delete-branch
Update main: git pull origin main

description: Resolve conflicts and merge PR #222 - Bump click from 8.1.8 to 8.3.0
steps: Check out PR #222 branch: dependabot/pip/click-8.3.0
Status is CONFLICTING - likely poetry.lock
Fetch latest main: git fetch origin main
Rebase on main: git rebase origin/main
Resolve poetry.lock conflict: accept both changes and run 'poetry lock --no-update'
Add resolved files: git add poetry.lock pyproject.toml
Continue rebase: git rebase --continue
Force push: git push -f origin dependabot/pip/click-8.3.0
Merge: gh pr merge 222 --admin --squash --delete-branch
Update main: git pull origin main

description: Resolve conflicts and merge PR #223 - Bump requests from 2.32.4 to 2.32.5
steps: Check out PR #223 branch: dependabot/pip/requests-2.32.5
Fetch main and rebase: git fetch origin main && git rebase origin/main
Resolve poetry.lock conflict with 'poetry lock --no-update'
Add files and continue: git add . && git rebase --continue
Force push: git push -f origin dependabot/pip/requests-2.32.5
Merge: gh pr merge 223 --admin --squash --delete-branch
Update main: git pull origin main

Check out PR #167 branch: release-please--branches--main--components--corrupt-video-inspector
Status is MERGEABLE
Review release notes and version changes
This is a release-please automated PR
If ready for release: gh pr merge 167 --admin --squash --delete-branch
If not ready: Close with comment explaining to re-run release-please when ready
Update main: git pull origin main
success_criteria: Either merged or closed with explanation
